00038 // isoscalar, scalar density matrix
00039 ManyBodyOperator OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO = {
00040   name : NULL,
00041   rank : 0,
00042   pi : 0,
00043   dim : 0,
00044   size : 0,
00045   par : NULL,
00046   me : calcDiagonalDensityMatrixHOod

00050 void initOpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO(DensityMatrixHOPar* par)
00051 {
00052   char* opname = malloc(40*sizeof(char));
00053   sprintf(opname, "DiagonalDensityMatrixHO-%d-%05.2f", 
00054           par->nmax, hbc*par->omega);
00055   
00056   OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO.name = opname;
00057   OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO.dim = (par->nmax+1)*(par->nmax+2);
00058   OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO.size = OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO.dim;
00059   OpDiagonalDensityMatrixHO.par = par;
00060 }

00062 
00063 // workspace
00064 
00065 complex double rho[4*HODIMMAX*4*HODIMMAX];
00066 
00067 
00068 void calcDiagonalDensityMatrixHOod(DensityMatrixHOPar* par,
00069                                    const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00070                                    const SlaterDetAux* X,
00071                                    complex double* rhodiag)
00072 {
00073   int dim = dimHOBasis(par->nmax);
00074   int idx;
00075 
00076   calcDensityMatrixHOod(par, Q, Qp, X, rho);
00077 
00078   int orbit, ixi, xi, N, n, l, twoj, twom; 
00079 
00080   orbit = 0;
00081   for (N=0; N<=par->nmax; N++) {
00082 
00083     for (ixi=0; ixi<=1; ixi++) {
00084       xi = ixi ? -1 : +1;
00085 
00086       for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00087         l=N-2*n;
00088         for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2) {
00089           rhodiag[orbit] = 0.0;
00090           for (twom=-twoj; twom<=twoj; twom=twom+2) {
00091             idx = HOxinljmidx(xi, n, l, twoj, twom);
00092             rhodiag[orbit] += rho[idx+idx*dim];
00093           }
00094           orbit++;
00095         }       
00096       }
00097     }
00098   }
00099 }

00101 
00102 void writeprojectedDiagonalDensityMatrixHO(FILE* fp,
00103                                            const Projection* P,
00104                                            const DensityMatrixHOPar* dmpar,
00105                                            int j, int pi, int a,
00106                                            void* dmatrix,
00107                                            const Eigenstates* E)
00108 {
00109   int nmax=dmpar->nmax;
00110   int dim=(dmpar->nmax+1)*(dmpar->nmax+2);
00111   int odd=P->odd;
00112   int jmax=P->jmax;
00113   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00114   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00115   double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00116   double H = E->v[ipj][idx];
00117 
00118   complex double (**dm)[dim] = dmatrix;
00119   complex double *noccu = dm[ipj][idx];
00120 
00121   char prefix[8];
00122   if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, pi ? '-' : '+'); 
00123   else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, pi ? '-' : '+'); 
00124 
00125 
00126   fprintf(fp, "\n%s (%8.3f MeV) occupation numbers: \n",
00127           prefix, hbc*H);
00128 
00129   int i;
00130   int orbit;
00131   double nshell, norbit[HONMAX+1];
00132   int ixi, xi, N, n, l, twoj;
00133 
00134   i=0;
00135   for (N=0; N<=nmax; N++) {
00136 
00137     fprintf(fp, "\n   N=%d\t\t", N);
00138     for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00139       l=N-2*n;
00140       for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2)
00141         fprintf(fp, "%s\t", labelHOorbit(n, l, twoj));
00142     }
00143     fprintf(fp, "\n");
00144 
00145     for (ixi=0; ixi<=1; ixi++) {
00146       xi = ixi ? -1 : +1;
00147       fprintf(fp, "%c  ", ixi ? 'n' : 'p');
00148 
00149       nshell = 0.0;
00150       orbit = 0;
00151       for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00152         l=N-2*n;
00153         for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2) {
00154           norbit[orbit] = noccu[i]/norm;
00155           i++;
00156           nshell += norbit[orbit];
00157           orbit++;
00158         }
00159       }
00160 
00161       fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t", nshell);
00162       for (orbit=0; orbit<=N; orbit++)
00163         fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t", norbit[orbit]);
00164       fprintf(fp, "\n");
00165     }
00166   }
00167   
00168   double ntot = 0.0;
00169   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00170     ntot += noccu[i]/norm;
00171 
00172   fprintf(fp, "\nTotal Occupation: %6.3f\n", ntot);
00173 
00174 }

00177 #define NMAXOUTPUT 3
00178 
00179 void writeprojectedDiagonalDensityMatricesHO(FILE* fp,
00180                                              const Projection* P,
00181                                              const DensityMatrixHOPar* dmpar,
00182                                              void* dmatrix,
00183                                              const Eigenstates* E)
00184 {
00185   int odd=P->odd;
00186   int jmax=P->jmax;
00187   int p,j,i;
00188   int ngood;
00189 
00190   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00191     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00192 
00193       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00194 
00195       for (i=0; i<MIN(ngood, NMAXOUTPUT); i++) {
00196 
00197         writeprojectedDiagonalDensityMatrixHO(fp, P, dmpar, j, p, i, dmatrix, E);
00198       
00199       }
00200     }
00201 
00202 }

00205 void writeprojectedDiagonalTransitionDensityMatrixHO(FILE* fp,
00206                                                      const Projection* P,
00207                                                      const DensityMatrixHOPar* dmpar,
00208                                                      int j, int pi, 
00209                                                      int af, int ai,
00210                                                      void* dmatrix,
00211                                                      const Eigenstates* E)
00212 {
00213   int nmax=dmpar->nmax;
00214   int dim=(dmpar->nmax+1)*(dmpar->nmax+2);
00215   int odd=P->odd;
00216   int jmax=P->jmax;
00217   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00218   int idxf = E->index[ipj][af];
00219   int idxi = E->index[ipj][ai];
00220   double normf = E->norm[ipj][idxf];
00221   double normi = E->norm[ipj][idxi];
00222   double Hf = E->v[ipj][idxf];
00223   double Hi = E->v[ipj][idxi];
00224 
00225   complex double (****dm)[dim] = dmatrix;
00226   complex double *transm = dm[ipj][ipj][idxf][idxi];
00227 
00228   complex double phase;
00229 
00230   // get rid of possible phase factors
00231   phase = transm[0]/cabs(transm[0]);
00232 
00233   char prefix[8];
00234   if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, pi ? '-' : '+'); 
00235   else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, pi ? '-' : '+'); 
00236 
00237 
00238   fprintf(fp, "\n%s (%8.3f MeV -> %8.3f MeV) transition numbers: \n",
00239           prefix, hbc*Hi, hbc*Hf);
00240 
00241   int i;
00242   int orbit;
00243   double nshell, norbit[HONMAX+1];
00244   int ixi, xi, N, n, l, twoj;
00245 
00246   i=0;
00247   for (N=0; N<=nmax; N++) {
00248 
00249     fprintf(fp, "\n   N=%d\t\t", N);
00250     for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00251       l=N-2*n;
00252       for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2)
00253         fprintf(fp, "%s\t", labelHOorbit(n, l, twoj));
00254     }
00255     fprintf(fp, "\n");
00256 
00257     for (ixi=0; ixi<=1; ixi++) {
00258       xi = ixi ? -1 : +1;
00259       fprintf(fp, "%c  ", ixi ? 'n' : 'p');
00260 
00261       nshell = 0.0;
00262       orbit = 0;
00263       for (n=N/2; n>=0; n--) {
00264         l=N-2*n;
00265         for (twoj=ABS(2*l-1); twoj<=2*l+1; twoj=twoj+2) {
00266           norbit[orbit] = creal(transm[i]/phase)/sqrt(normi*normf);
00267           i++;
00268           nshell += norbit[orbit];
00269           orbit++;
00270         }
00271       }
00272 
00273       fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t", nshell);
00274       for (orbit=0; orbit<=N; orbit++)
00275         fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t", norbit[orbit]);
00276       fprintf(fp, "\n");
00277     }
00278   }
00279   
00280   double ntot = 0.0;
00281   for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00282     ntot += creal(transm[i]/phase)/sqrt(normi*normf);
00283 
00284   fprintf(fp, "\nTotal Strength: %6.3f\n", ntot);
00285 
00286 }
